title: Rihanna to donate proceeds from every pink Savage x Fenty style purchased to Clara Lionel Foundation for breast cancer
text:
This Breast Cancer Awareness month, Savage x Fenty is celebrating Thrivers – a lesser known group of young women living with aggressive forms of breast cancer. Credit: Instagram

Rihanna has released a limited edition lingerie range to raise money for breast cancer research.

Fenty Corp founder Rihanna, is raising money for breast cancer with a limited edition Savage x Fenty collection. She's decided to release a #SavageXThrivers #UXTRA VIP box for breast cancer awareness month in a bid to raise money for the Clara Lionel Foundation, which helps support critical research for aggressive forms of breast cancer.

The VIP box features a scalloped lace bralette, a Brazilian lace set in pink, and a pack of Savage-themed dominoes.

The hitmaker reportedly wanted to create something that was easy for customers to shop.

Compiled by Afika Jadezweni
